name: Roguelike (berubejd)
description:
RoguelikeDev  The Complete Roguelike Tutorial  v2020 (in Godot)

Overview

Over the summer of 2020, I'll be participating in the the summer code-along series that is being held by r/roguelikedev. I will try to provide one or more check-ins per week to keep up with the shared progress of the group.

Enjoy week 2's results...
